verses.verse: So <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> to <S%H4480>answer<s%> <S%H6030><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H6662>righteous<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

Then was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> the <S%H639>wrath<s%> of <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite,<s%> of the <S%H4480>kindred<s%> <S%H4940><s%> of <S%H7410>Ram:<s%> against <S%H347>Job<s%> was his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> he <S%H6663>justified<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> rather than <S%H4480>God.<s%> <S%H430><s%>

Also against his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7453>friends<s%> was his <S%H639>wrath<s%> <S%H2734>kindled,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they had <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4617>answer,<s%> and yet had <S%H7561>condemned<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H347>Job.<s%>

Now <S%H453>Elihu<s%> had <S%H2442>waited<s%> <S%H853>till<s%> <S%H347>Job<s%> had <S%H1697>spoken,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1992>they<s%> were <S%H2205>elder<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> he.

When <S%H453>Elihu<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> in the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> then his <S%H639>wrath<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled.<s%>

And <S%H453>Elihu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1292>Barachel<s%> the <S%H940>Buzite<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6810>young,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> are very <S%H3453>old;<s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H5921>wherefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I was <S%H2119>afraid,<s%> and <S%H3372>durst<s%> not <S%H4480>show<s%> <S%H2331><s%> you mine <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>
I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3117>Days<s%> should <S%H1696>speak,<s%> and <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H8141>years<s%> should <S%H3045>teach<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%>
But <S%H403><s%> there is a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in <S%H582>man:<s%> and the <S%H5397>inspiration<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> giveth them <S%H995>understanding.<s%>
Great <S%H7227><s%> men are <S%H3808>not<s%> always <S%H2449>wise:<s%> neither do the <S%H2205>aged<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hearken<s%> to me; <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H2331>show<s%> mine <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I <S%H3176>waited<s%> for your <S%H1697>words;<s%> I gave <S%H238>ear<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> your <S%H8394>reasons,<s%> <S%H5704>whilst<s%> ye searched <S%H2713>out<s%> what to <S%H4405>say.<s%>

Yea, I <S%H995>attended<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> you, and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> you that <S%H3198>convinced<s%> <S%H347>Job,<s%> or that <S%H6030>answered<s%> his words: <S%H561><s%>
Lest <S%H6435><s%> ye should <S%H559>say,<s%> We have found <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom:<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> thrusteth him <S%H5086>down,<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>
Now he hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H6186>directed<s%> his <S%H4405>words<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> me: <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H7725>answer<s%> him with your <S%H561>speeches.<s%>
They were <S%H2865>amazed,<s%> they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more:<s%> they left <S%H6275>off<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4405>speaking.<s%>
When I had <S%H3176>waited,<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> they <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> stood <S%H5975>still,<s%> and <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more;)<s%>
I said, <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> my <S%H2506>part,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H637>also<s%> will <S%H2331>show<s%> mine <S%H1843>opinion.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> I am <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4405>matter,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H990>within<s%> me <S%H6693>constraineth<s%> me.
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> my <S%H990>belly<s%> is as <S%H3196>wine<s%> which hath <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6605>vent;<s%> it is ready to <S%H1234>burst<s%> like <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H178>bottles.<s%>
I will <S%H1696>speak,<s%> that I may be <S%H7304>refreshed:<s%> I will <S%H6605>open<s%> my <S%H8193>lips<s%> and <S%H6030>answer.<s%>

Let me <S%H408>not,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>you,<s%> <S%H5375>accept<s%> any <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H6440>person,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> let me give flattering <S%H3655>titles<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> to give flattering <S%H3655>titles;<s%> in so doing my <S%H6213>maker<s%> would <S%H4592>soon<s%> take me <S%H5375>away.<s%>
